concept.title: 8.405 Ordering procedures for Federal Supply Schedules.

conbody.p: Ordering activities shall use the ordering procedures of this section when placing an order or establishing a BPA for supplies or services. The procedures in this section apply to all schedules. For establishing BPAs and for orders under BPAs see 8.405-3.
